message.body: I'm working with Leah the Crop Top Girl on this project this weekend and I'm having thoughts
Lets move it to June 1st!!!!
Although then te sipps can't go
I know! and i really want the sipps there but i see the benefits of changing it and i feel very conflicted and still need to talk to amy
Lets decide today
I'm worried about cooking for June 1, because we won't really be able to cook the day before, and we won't have much time before the party unless we jus
t don't sleep
You're not cooking anything!
I'm gonna help duh
All the stuff we need help with we can do the day before prom I'm pretty sure. And I'm totally okay with waking up early the day after prom you don't have to do shit
I'm still gonna have to get my house ready and stuff. and you hate waking up early. i also just really want gary to be there
Okay so we're not going to change it for Kalev just because we want Gary to be there? So many people can't go that weekend! And Laura said they might be back that night
re for a party and then party all night long and then wake up again and go to another grad party. it's a panic attack waiting to happen for me
I know, I know. I just think it's going to be really stressful to have prom and after prom and after-after prom and then wake up bright n early to prepa
Fine
I'm still thinking about it
Forget it we don't have time to think about it we need to make a decision the 25th is fine
should definitely talk about it
I feel like things just got very tense very fast. If it would make you more upset to have it on the 25th than it would make me to have it on the 1st, we
No that's fine
Please tell me if it's not actually fine
